favourite.article: This past few weeks I enjoyed that absolutely nothing bad can happen to us! Nothing bad at all. In our perspective, often times we think it's the end of the world when something bad happens to us. But we are like frogs looking up from the bottom of a well. Hallelujah in God's perspective, nothing bad can happen to us because everything is done and arranged by God for our growth in life and for His purpose!!! God wants to gain our heart through every situation we go through. Whatever may happen in my life, keep my heart open and soft toward You. Keep me looking away unto You Lord, keep dispensing Yourself into my being!
Lord! Open our hearts, speak to us Lord. Set our minds on things that are above, not on the things that are on earth. We love You Lord Jesus!
Hebrews 12:2: Looking away unto Jesus, the Author and Perfecter of our faith...Keep us Lord looking away from all the distracting things unto You, so You can make us believers!
Keep me looking at You...

The only way we can believe in Jesus is if we see Him :) And I'm not speaking about seeing Him physically but spiritually. We need Him to appear to us, as He did with Abraham in the Old Testament and Paul in the New Testament. Nor Abraham or Paul saw Him physically BUT His appearance was enough to make them a believers :) Abraham is called "the father of faith" and "the friend of God", and Paul changed his life, his way, his scale of values, his everything because what he saw of God made him a believer. Is not enough just to hear about God, we need to see Him, then we are going to be captivated by Him :)
Lord, make me a believer by looking at You daily. Keep my eyes looking at You. Don't let me get distracted with other things that are not You. Increase my hunger for You, that I may enjoy You in your Word daily. O Lord, dear Lord I JUST LOVE YOU!
Make me a believer by looking at You!

To answer JF question
John 20:25 The other disciples therefore said to Thomas, We have seen the Lord! but he said to them. Unless I see his hands the mark of the nails and put my finger into the mark of the nails and put my hand into His hand into his side, I will by no means believe.
So Thomas is saying "make me a believer." by looking at Him.

There in no verse in the Bible that speaks of "Make me a believer". But there many instances throughout the Bible where God Himself opens the door for us to Believe. John 1:12, John 1:43-51 and this precious one in John 3:15. This song does strike a core, because many time we act as "un-believers" in our Christian walk, but our keeping our spiritual eyes looking at Him, in His word, this will increase our faith and love for Him. Everyday I need Him to "make me a believer" so I can grow in life and be a useful vessel unto Him.
Just wondering where the phrase "make me a believer" is from. Which verse?

May the Lord continue to open our hearts unto Him. Our environment maybe in a chaotic situation, but He will surely remain the same and faithful to us. "Lord Jesus whatever happens,just keep our hearts open and soft toward You."

Whatever may happen, I know You want to gain my heart. Though I may not understand, Just keep dispensing into my every part.
Thank You Lord for Your love, make my heart loving You. I just want to be part of Your bride.
inspired.

Lord, just gain my heart.
Dispense Yourself into me day by day, moment by moment.
Lord, I just love You.
Lord keep my heart open and soft for You!! Amen!!
Lord keep my eyes to see nothing else but YOU. OH whatever may happen, LORD, gain my heart.
Lord, Whatever may happen, I know You want to gain my heart. Though I may not understand, Just keep dispensing into my every part.

Haz mi corazón, tierno y abierto a Ti
1. Haz mi_cora--zón, tierno y_abierto a Ti. Que mi mi-rar, se-ea solo_hacia Ti.
Que pase lo que pase, Se_que_quieres_mi, corazo-ón ganar, Aunque no lo entienda bien, Sigue dispensándo-ote en mi ser.
Hazme un creyente, Por medio de ver. (Verte a Ti) Firme en la verda---ad, Fiel y veraz.
Lord Jesus, thank You for taking care of our heart. We love You so much! Amen!
I feel this hymn should be the cry of every saint's heart. Lord, keep my heart open and soft towards You, so we may be transformed and conformed into the image of Christ. Amen.

I like to pray "Lord, no matter what happens, may I still love You." Whenever I wait for exam results to come out or jobs to be released.
We know that we are weak. My biggest fear is to be blinded by our own desires and miss seeing God's will for us in the situation when the situation comes.
May we have a heart that is open and soft toward Him. Father, we know that You love us. Whatever this situation is all about, by faith we know this is working out to salvation. All we want is Your presence now.

I really enjoyed the key in this song to having a heart for the Lord that is soft and open toward Him, His Word. We need to be those in the Word daily. It's by being in the Word, in His presence, that we hear Him, see Him, and are infused with Him. We need to be those standing on His Word.
It is by the Lord's mercy that our hearts remain open and soft to Him. Thus, we should always come to the Lord for this matter.

A brother in Christ is suffering a tremendos loss in his family right now. The brother is an anointed man of God and I know the devil is using this tragedy to destroy him. Please pray for him that the Lord will keep his heart open and soft.
Lord, build Your home in all my heart.

"Though I may not understand, just keep dispensing into my every part." These lines are one of my favourites because during those difficult times in life when you have no clue why the Lord arranged a situation for you, singing this over and over again keeps you open to God's dispensing!

Come quickly Lord. Every moment, keep our hearts open and soft toward You. Keep our eyes fixed solely on You as we sojourn on this Earth. Grant us to be those who hasten Your coming. Come quickly Lord!
Amen, brothers and sisters. May this song guide us and keep us that we would be open and soft in our heart to do and be useful in His economy. From yp in Paranaque.
"Lord, keep my heart" is my favorite song.
Oh Lord, keep us open and soft towards You! Even in this age, oh Lord just keep us in You! Lord, You are the only One!

In our daily life, there are a lot of things which the Lord has sovereignly prepared for us. Though we may not understand, we just need to remember that God's heart toward us is always good. We don't have to worry or be anxious. We just need to keep ourselves open every avenue of our being, allow Him to gain our heart, give Him the way to keep dispensing to our every part. Just believe in Him, He's the Faithful and True one. "Faithful is He who called you, and who also will do it."

Amen! No matter what happens, the Lord just wants to gain our hearts! Lord, meet us in our circumstances and in our daily life that You would gain our hearts fully!! Don't let us go! Keep reminding us though we may not understand and we may get discouraged, You are there waiting. Amen!

This song is so sweet, it fills my heart with love and appreciation of what the Lord has done for me. At my high school I talk to students who have grown up without Christ and they all have such sad stories to tell. The Lord has really kept me and just by looking at Him I can enjoy His grace, I think that is so amazing. Thank You Lord!!! Gracias Seor, te amo ti!!!

I first heard and learned this when I was in the valley. The words touched me so much, it became my prayer to the Lord; especially "made me a believer". How we need the Lord to come once again, appear to us, be our believing.
Aleluia! Esse deve ser minha oracao. Que o Senhor me atraia, cada dia mais, com a Sua belaza, e me faca um vaso aberto ao dispensar de Suas riquezas! Me conformando a Sua imagem. Aleluia!

I learned this song in such a sweet way. A sister was having a hard day and she called me and left me a message singing this song. She told me that she enjoyed that even if we don't understand...whatever may happen, it's for the Lord to gain our heart. Praise the Lord!

The last time I sang this one of the young sisters had fractured her ankle and we were all gathered around the couch singing songs from the young people's song book to comfort her until they could take her to the ambulance. It was a very sweet time.
It touches my heart. Amen! Praise the Lord!

The world around me keeps changing in ways I don't understand. It saddens me with nothing in sight. Oh yes but there is hope! My Lord is the constant One always true and faithful. Lord Jesus I love You and yes Lord, I trust You.

This song reminds me about our dear Bro. Tom Engel who went to be with the LORD. The Last time he attended the meeting he sang this song to the Church in Long Beach. This was his favorite song. He kept on singing this song. Though his physical body was weakening his spirit was so fresh and even refresh the saints who are visiting him. I believe every word of this song uplifted his spirit and even supplied the saints around him. Whenever I sing this song, I am ushered into my spirit. This song became a prayer of mine too. Praise the LORD. We also sang this song during his memorial.
It has a sad feeling and somewhat good feeling also. When I first heard this song it touched me deeply and it made me feel how precious the Lord really is. Amen!

We may not be able to understand the Lord's plan for us and think that things are impossible, yet we just have to have a simple heart to believe that He is more than able/capable to make things possible. Praise the Lord that He is the reality in us.. Amen.

I just love to listen to this song now and again because it's smooth and gentle and touches me so much. Our Lord is really a wonderful and gentle Lord. My prayer is that the Lord will draw us more closer and nearer to acknowlege the abandance of grace He has in store for His saints. "Oh dear Lord Jesus, please keep us beholding your radience face, keep us gazing on you and you alone and also keep despensing Yourself to us. Amen

Мне очень нравится эта песня! В ней говорится о моих переживаниях: мне так нужно сердце, которое всегда открыто для Господа, и которое всегда мягкое по отношению к Нему! Господь, я люблю Тебя все сильнее!

I like this song, its tune and its lyrics... may this be my constant prayer too. I am not faithful, but You are the faithful One! Praise the Lord! No matter what happens, may I turn back to You and Your Word to receive your fresh dispensing! Amen.
